item.title: A song of the |kam-ssin !ku (or Sun Bushmen)
item.summary: A song of the |kam-ssin !ku (Sun Bushmen) mourning the loss of a son.
item.comments: 1) See also Different Bushmen in !nanni and Tamme's country and The song of the ||gani (a bird) and The song of the !korro-ssin !ku (or Pit-making Bushmen) and Song of the ||ku and Song of the !kan ||ka ||karashe and The song of the Sauko and The song of the ||noruko djo-djo and The song of the mother of the little buck and The song of the ≠na≠n'arro and The song of the Ngogan-a (a little bird) and The song of the !ke tsa'ba (a bird), 2) This is found in Book XI & XII-3
item.author: Tamme (XII)

keyword.subkw: song about mourning loss of a son
